original_text: Judah saw that the things belonged to him. He said, ‘She is more honest than I am. She has done this because I would not give her to my son, Shelah, as his wife.’ Judah did not have sex with Tamar again.
korean_text: 유다가 그것들을 알아보고 이르되 그는 나보다 옳도다 내가 그를 내 아들 셀라에게 주지 아니하였음이로다 하고 다시는 그를 가까이 하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Judah saw that the things belonged to him
She is more honest than I am
because I would not give her to my son
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 내가 그녀를 내 아들에게 주지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: Judah did not have sex with Tamar again
sentences.korean_translation: 유다는 다마르와 다시 성관계를 하지 않았다
